Text.Page:
A large contingent of crestarath mercenaries, prions, and mutants have blocked access to the Lost Mines.

Get out there and cut down the {@LinkCreature:40#27#crestarath slayers}, {@LinkCreature:40#26#reapers}, and {@LinkCreature:40#25#archers}, {@LinkCreature:40#14#prion devastators}, and {@LinkCreature:40#16#mutant miners} around the mines. We'll pay well for each crest you recover.

Report to Lashirah at the Quarantine Zone Research Center.
There will be more missions for you, <PCNAME>. Well done.
There's no pay for no crests, <PCNAME>. Bring me all you can find.
